feature.name: Gluster Support
feature.description: Support for Gluster Volumes and Bricks

feature.name: Display Host Sockets
feature.description: Number of host sockets displayed. 'cores' now show num of cores per socket --> total cores in host is: cores*sockets

feature.name: Search - Case Sensitivity
feature.description: Ability to specify whether a search query should ignore case, by providing a URL parameter

feature.name: Max Results for GET Request
feature.description: Ability to specify max number of results returned from a GET request

feature.name: Correlation-Id
feature.description: Enable setting Correlation-Id for POST and PUT commands, using a header.

feature.name: Activate/Deactivate disk
feature.description: Disk may be activated or deactivated (POST .../disks/{disk:id}/activate, POST .../disks/{disk:id}/deactivate

feature.name: Activate/Deactivate NIC
feature.description: NIC may be activated or deactivated (POST .../nics/{nic:id}/activate, POST .../nics/{nic:id}/deactivate

feature.name: Snapshots Refactoring
feature.description: Snapshot is no a point-of-time representation of a VM, including sublollections such as disks, nics, cdroms...

feature.name: Remove Template Disks From Specified Storage-Domain
feature.description: Ability to remove template images from a specific storage-domain: DELETE .../api/templates/{template:id}/disks/{disk:id}, supplying <action><storage_domain id="xxx"</storage_domain></action>

feature.name: Floating Disks
feature.description: A disk may be attached to 0 VMs. Such a disk is 'floating'. Therefore disks now also appear in the root collection, no only under VM: .../api/disks. Attaching a disk to VM is done by adding a disk with an existing ID to the VM. Detaching a disk from a VM is done by deleting the Disk from the VM, supplying 'detach=true'

feature.name: Async Delete
feature.description: Ability to specify that DELETE request will be performed asynchronously, using the 'async' url parameter.

feature.name: Session Based Authentication
feature.description: Ability to maintain client-server session, to avoid login per request. Done by providing a header

feature.name: VM Applications
feature.description: List of Applications installed on a VM. VM Applications appear under VM: .../api/vms/xxx/applications.

feature.name: VirtIO-SCSI Support
feature.description: Support for paravirtualized SCSI controller device.

feature.name: Custom comment in the resource
feature.description: At this point added ability to add custom comment only to the datacenter, in future versions we may allow it in other resources as well.

feature.name: Refresh Host Capabilities
feature.description: Getting host data synchronized with getVdsCaps (GET .../hosts/{host:id};force

feature.name: Memory Snapshot
feature.description: Ability to save memory state as part of snapshot.

feature.name: Watchdog Device
feature.description: Ability to create watchdog devices in VM's

feature.name: SSH Authentication Method
feature.description: Ability to authenticate by SSH to host using privileged user password or SSH public key

feature.name: Force Select SPM
feature.description: Ability to force select a host as SPM

feature.name: Console Device
feature.description: Ability to control attaching of console devices in VM's

feature.name: Storage server connections of a storage domain
feature.description: Ability to view storage server connections of a specific storage domain (GET .../storagedomains/{storagedomain:id}/storageconnections)

feature.name: Attach/Detach storage server connections (to/from a storage domain)
feature.description: Ability to attach/detach storage server connections to/from a specific storage domain (common use case: disaster recovery).

feature.name: Single PCI for Qxl
feature.description: Ability to view multiple video devices via single PCI guest device

feature.name: Add VM from OVF configuration
feature.description: Ability to add VM from provided OVF configuration.

feature.name: Vnic Profiles
feature.description: Configuring VM network interface by a profile (for network QoS, custom properties and port mirroring)

feature.name: Image Storage Domains (Tech Preview)
feature.description: Importing and exporting images from and to image storage domain (as for example OpenStack glance)

feature.name: Gluster Hooks management
feature.description: Ability to manage gluster hooks in cluster

feature.name: VM FQDN
feature.description: Ability to report the fully qualified domain name (FQDN) of a Virtual Machine

feature.name: Attaching Disk snapshot to a vm
feature.description: Support for attaching a disk snapshot to a vm.

feature.name: Cloud Init
feature.description: Support for VM initialization with Cloud Init.

feature.name: Scheduling policy units list
feature.description: Internal/External policy units used by VM Scheduler (filter/weight/balance)

feature.name: Scheduling policies collection
feature.description: Ability to get a list of oVirt's scheduling policies

feature.name: Gluster Bricks management
feature.description: Ability to delete gluster bricks with data migration using the actions migrate and DELETE. Action migrate in combination with stopmigrate, migrates the data and brick can be reused further.

feature.name: Copy and Move backend disk
feature.description: Support for copy/move disk in additional context.

feature.name: Network Labels
feature.description: Abilitiy to provision networks on hosts via labels.

feature.name: Reboot VM
feature.description: Ability to reboot VM

feature.name: Maintenance
feature.description: Enable or disable VM maintenance mode.

feature.name: Manage iSCSI Bonds
feature.description: Add/modify/remove iSCSI Bonds.

feature.name: Bookmarks
feature.description: Add/modify/remove bookmarks.

feature.name: Network Custom Properties
feature.description: Configure custom properties when provisioning networks on hosts.

feature.name: Remove disk from VM snapshot
feature.description: Ability to remove a disk from a VM snapshot

feature.name: Disk Snapshots list in Storage Domain context
feature.description: Ability to get a list of Disk Snapshots by a Storage Domain

feature.name: Instance Types
feature.description: Add/modify/remove instance types.

feature.name: NumaNodes
feature.description: Add/modify/remove numanodes.

feature.name: Mac Pools
feature.description: Configuring MAC address pools for data centers

feature.name: Disk Profiles
feature.description: Configuring Disk's profile, for Storage Domain and QoS

feature.name: Cpu Profiles
feature.description: Configuring Cpu's profile, for Cluster and QoS

feature.name: External Host Providers
feature.description: Add/modify/remove external host providers.

feature.name: Katello Errata
feature.description: View available Katello Errata for vms, hosts and system.

feature.name: Cumulative Network Usage Statistics
feature.description: Reporting of cumulative RX/TX statistics for host and VM network interfaces.

feature.name: Guest Memory Cached/Buffered
feature.description: Report of used cached and buffered memory in the guest OS

feature.name: OpenStack Volume Providers
feature.description: Add/modify/remove OpenStack volume providers.

feature.name: Refresh LUNs Size
feature.description: Refresh the LUN size in order to reflect an increase in the size of a storage domain

feature.name: Network Attachments
feature.description: Abilitiy to provision networks on hosts by network attachment.

feature.name: Enroll Host Certificate
feature.description: Enroll host certificate in order to renew existing certificate

feature.name: SR-IOV
feature.description: Natively support SR-IOV
